## Usage

```{r, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}
library(minixcali)

d <- Excali_doc()
shape <- xkd_rectangle(width = 300, height=200,
                       fillStyle = 'hachure', roughness = 2)
d$add(shape)
d$export(file='output.json')

```
